lines.p:
How long, O Jehovah, will you forget me? Forever?
How long will you hide your face from me?

How long will I have anxious concern,With grief in my heart each day?
How long will my enemy triumph over me?

Look upon me and answer me, O Jehovah my God.
Give light to my eyes, so that I may not fall asleep in death,

So that my enemy will not say: “I have defeated him!”
Do not let my opponents rejoice over my downfall.
As for me, I trust in your loyal love;My heart will rejoice in your acts of salvation.
I will sing to Jehovah, for he has richly rewarded me.
